
    //  The sources for each of the libraries.
    //  ======================================
    
        jquery.js   => http://jquery.com/
                    => http://code.jquery.com/jquery-2.0.3.min.js // has deprecated @sourceMappingURL
                    => http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.8.3.min.js
                    => http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.7.2.min.js -- everything else has an animation bug, on moving the sidebar

        mini_colors => https://github.com/claviska/jquery-minicolors
                    => https://github.com/claviska/jquery-minicolors/archive/master.zip
                    => https://raw.github.com/claviska/jquery-minicolors/master/jquery.minicolors.js

        flexselect  => http://rmm5t.github.io/jquery-flexselect/
                    => http://jquery-flexselect.s3.amazonaws.com/jquery.flexselect-0.5.2.zip
                    => https://raw.github.com/rmm5t/jquery-flexselect/master/jquery.flexselect.js
                    => https://raw.github.com/rmm5t/jquery-flexselect/master/liquidmetal.js
                    
        konami_js   => https://code.google.com/p/konami-js/
                    => https://konami-js.googlecode.com/files/konami.1.3.3.js
                    => https://konami-js.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/konami.js
                    
        fiji_xhr    => https://code.google.com/p/xhr/
                    => https://xhr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/xhr.js
                    
        md5         => http://pajhome.org.uk/crypt/md5/scripts.html
                    => http://pajhome.org.uk/crypt/md5/jshash-2.2.zip => md5.js
